I would like to test the waters regarding possible interest in 
developing =
a supervisor network for NEAT, using a version of NEAT to 
evolve said supe=
rvisor network. The primary objective envisioned being 
the evolution of a =
supervisor network which controls the trans-
generational parameters normal=
ly contained in the ".ne" file, for the 
express purpose accelerating the u=
nderlying arbitrary user task 
evolution.

Subsequent to the selection of c=
andidate inputs, the output would be 
the genome of said supervisor, tested=
 against a baseline of experiments 
to evaluate added utility, where the co=
operative contribution would be 
individual champion genomes from users, ev=
olved against their pet 
experiments, for the purpose of expanding the gene=
rality of the 
supervisor network genome. The generality of the effort has =
the 
potential to benifit the entire community of users, while maintaining =

the absence of any specifics regarding the arbitrary user specific 
tasks.=


Any thoughts or suggests.
